Class BookingController

java.lang.Object
bto.Controllers.BookingController
public class BookingController extends Object
The BookingController class manages the flat booking process for BTO (Build-To-Order) housing projects. It provides functionality for creating, processing, and tracking bookings, as well as generating receipts for approved bookings.

This controller maintains several data structures to track bookings, rejected bookings, and receipts, serving as a central management point for all booking-related operations in the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • BookingController

      public BookingController()
      Default constructor for BookingController. Initializes all required data structures for tracking bookings, rejections, and receipts.

  • Method Details

    • createBooking

      public boolean createBooking(FlatBooking booking)
      Creates a new flat booking in the system. Used primarily in the officer interface.
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking to create
      Returns:
      true if the booking was created successfully, false if the booking is invalid or the applicant already has a booking

    • processBooking

      public FlatBooking processBooking(Applicant applicant, Project project, FlatType flatType)
      Processes a booking for an applicant in a specific project for a selected flat type. This method is preserved for compatibility with older code.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant requesting the booking
      project - The project to book a flat in
      flatType - The type of flat to book
      Returns:
      The created FlatBooking if successful, null otherwise

    • createBooking

      public boolean createBooking(ProjectApplication application, HDBOfficer officer)
      Creates a booking from a project application, processed by a specific HDB officer. This is an overloaded version of createBooking used in the officer interface.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to create a booking for
      officer - The HDB officer processing the booking
      Returns:
      true if the booking was created successfully, false otherwise

    • rejectBooking

      public boolean rejectBooking(ProjectApplication application, String rejectionReason)
      Rejects a booking request for a project application with a specified reason. Creates a rejected booking record or updates an existing booking to rejected status.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to reject
      rejectionReason - The reason for rejecting the booking
      Returns:
      true if the rejection was processed successfully, false otherwise

    • hasApprovedBooking

      public boolean hasApprovedBooking(ProjectApplication application)
      Checks if a project application has an approved booking.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to check
      Returns:
      true if the application has an approved booking, false otherwise

    • getBookingStatus

      public String getBookingStatus(ProjectApplication application)
      Gets the booking status for a project application.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to get the booking status for
      Returns:
      The booking status, or null if no booking exists

    • getBookingForApplication

      public FlatBooking getBookingForApplication(ProjectApplication application)
      Gets the booking associated with a project application.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to get the booking for
      Returns:
      The FlatBooking object if found, null otherwise

    • getAllBookings

      public List<FlatBooking> getAllBookings()
      Gets a list of all bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all FlatBooking objects

    • getPendingBookings

      public List<FlatBooking> getPendingBookings()
      Gets a list of all pending bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of FlatBooking objects with pending status

    • getApprovedBookings

      public List<FlatBooking> getApprovedBookings()
      Gets a list of all approved bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of FlatBooking objects with approved status

    • getRejectedBookings

      public List<FlatBooking> getRejectedBookings()
      Gets a list of all rejected bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of FlatBooking objects with rejected status

    • generateAndStoreReceipt

      public Receipt generateAndStoreReceipt(FlatBooking booking)
      Generates and stores a receipt for a booking. If a receipt already exists for the applicant, returns the existing receipt.
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking to generate a receipt for
      Returns:
      The generated Receipt object if successful, null otherwise

    • hasReceipt

      public boolean hasReceipt(String nric)
      Checks if a receipt exists for an applicant with the specified NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant to check
      Returns:
      true if a receipt exists for the applicant, false otherwise

    • getReceiptForApplicant

      public Receipt getReceiptForApplicant(String nric)
      Gets the receipt for an applicant with the specified NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      The Receipt object if found, null otherwise

    • updateFlatAvailability

      public boolean updateFlatAvailability(Project project, FlatType flatType)
      Updates the availability of a flat type in a project by decrementing the available units count.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to update
      flatType - The flat type to update availability for
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful (units available), false otherwise

    • generateReceipt

      public boolean generateReceipt(ProjectApplication application)
      Generates a receipt for a project application. This method retrieves the booking associated with the application and generates a receipt.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to generate a receipt for
      Returns:
      true if the receipt was generated successfully, false otherwise

    • setBookings

      public void setBookings(List<FlatBooking> bookingsList)
      Sets the bookings map from a list of FlatBooking objects. Clears the existing map and rebuilds it using the applicant NRIC as keys.
      Parameters:
      bookingsList - The list of bookings to set

    • setReceipts

      public void setReceipts(List<Receipt> receiptsList)
      Sets the receipts map from a list of Receipt objects. Clears the existing map and rebuilds it using the applicant NRIC as keys.
      Parameters:
      receiptsList - The list of receipts to set

    • getAllReceipts

      public List<Receipt> getAllReceipts()
      Gets a list of all receipts in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all Receipt objects
